reference.shortdesc: The notices element references a topic containing special notice information, such as legal notices about supplementary copyrights and trademarks associated with the book.

section.title: Usage Information
section.p: Use a notices element within either the front matter or back matter of a book.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The notices element is specialized from topicref. It is defined in the bookmap module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how to use a notices topic to include legal content:
example.codeblock: <backmatter> <notices href="notices.dita" navtitle="Legal notices"> <topicmeta> <navtitle>Legal notices</navtitle> </topicmeta> </notices> <booklists> <!-- Index, glossary, or other lists --> </booklists> </backmatter>
